website_summaries.verdict: Adorable gumball machine with food cart. Kids love unloading and reloading the gumball machine.
pros: Gumballs can be opened and refilled over and over again
Shopkins can ride on the candy cart
Great durability for a Shopkins toy
cons: Only comes with two Shopkins, and gumballs are hard to open

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: This looked so fun and I got it for the kids for xmas. It was a disappointment and I wish I had never bought it. The kids expected shopkins inside the balls and instead the balls are empty and they are supposed to fill them with their own shopkins. Also, the red lid on the gumball machine does not fit when all the balls are in the machine. Why couldn't the company put a little shopkin inside each ball? They cost nothing to produce.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite shopkins toy yet
customer_reviews.text: Ok - I hate shopkins. They're all over my house on the floor and in cracks and crevices. But, my daughter loves them. When searching for a Shopkins toy that she didn't have already or that I wouldn't find all over my house, I found this. You can put the shopkins in those little "gum balls" and they come out. You can use other Shopkins you already have. She has fun surprising her friends on choosing a surprise Shopkins from the machine. My only critique is that then gumball machine is attached to shelves making for awkward storage. I wish it was just a Shopkins gumball machine.
customer_reviews.author: MommyToTwoGals

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a huge fan of Shopkins....
customer_reviews.text: But my 4 year old is.... she opened this toy up and played happily for over an hour. And I'll admit, this set is cute. Bigger than I expected. Lots of space to display Shopkins (make sure to buy a couple packs if you don't already have them) and the gumball machine is adorable. Oddly, the cart in my toy is not the same as the one pictured on the box it came in but not a major concern.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Candy vending machine
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves to have candies from vending machines. So recently I saw this on Amazon and ordered it for her. Oh boy she loves it, we fill up the balls with candies and she is allowed to have those whenever she wants. The build quality is good and balls are good enough to hold Hershey's kisses or M&Ms.
customer_reviews.author: Irfan Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Cute interactive Shopkins toy.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a smash hit for my 2.5 yr old as a Christmas gift. Ever since she's been watching these little youtube videos of Shopkins surprise toys, I thought she should actually play with one and see that it's more fun to play than watch. She loves twisting the gumball machine and seeing the balls roll out. Whatever she can fit in those gumballs is fun for her too. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexismd

customer_reviews.title: This playset is awesome, my daughter loves gumball machines and Shopkins so ...
customer_reviews.text: This playset is awesome, my daughter loves gumball machines and Shopkins so win win, she can turn the handle and the gumballs come out, no money required, you can also fill the gumballs with Shopkins if you want, we also got the Shopkins candy pack to go along with it and both of them together make a really awesome playset, definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Like a little shopkins candy store!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute shopkins set! My daughter loves to put shopkins in the little gum ball shaped eggs and pretend that she's turning a quarter machine. The set comes with different colored balls that open to put shopkins inside. Also comes with a little cart and red stand.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: awesome shopkins playset
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Shopkins playset. I bought two for my twin girls and they really love it. All kids love going to the toy coin vending machines, and this gives you one at home. You place your shopkins in the plastic balls, load up the hopper, and you're ready to vend.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is adorable. My daughter loved it for a birthday present. She is at the age of loving the grocery store $.50 quarter machines. So she loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fun to play with shopkins with
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fun to play with shopkins with. My younger daughter had been asking for this for months and it was much cheaper here than in any box store I found it at.
customer_reviews.author: ggeamom

customer_reviews.title: Sweet fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, lots of play-ability, works great with the other sets I have. It takes a little fiddling to get the lid to fit on the gumball machine with all the balls in but just turn the dispensor dial a little bit and they shift so they all fit.
customer_reviews.author: Vara Shamus

customer_reviews.title: They both love it and it is the perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: My two daughters are 5 and 7 and are shopkin crazed. They got this to play with with their collection. They both love it and it is the perfect addition. They love popping out the balls and the candy cart. Perfect playset for the shopkins collectors.
customer_reviews.author: Jan6177

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her cousins played with this a long time. She loved it. Great gift for anyone who loves shopkins.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a let down
customer_reviews.text: Gum balls get a little crowded, have to arrange just so to get them to fit. Honestly, doesn't interest my daughter much but can never predict that.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Dow, Novelist:LIBERTY & MEANS, UNBRIDLED HOLIDAY

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loved this toy, it's cute and fun and she has a Shopkins 2ds game that has a gumball machine they shopkins come out of to collect.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeStray

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the size of the item. It is nice. The colors are bright, it looks easy to use and works like a real gum ball dispenser. Plus it was packaged well, which made the recipient of the gift (toddler) ever more excited to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I expected which made me happy. The 5 year old who I bought this for loved it. It keeps her pretty occupied for a while.
customer_reviews.author: foreverthetruth

customer_reviews.title: Best shopkins toy available
customer_reviews.text: The most entertaining shopkins set I've seen. Kids can setup their own shopkins shop with a gumball machine type toy to put their shopkins in. Not sure why this isn't more expensive since it's so much nicer than the ones you see for $20-$30.
customer_reviews.author: Brak

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved this! played with it quite a bit until she decided she was into other toys. LOL Good gift though!
customer_reviews.author: Illene Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for any shopkins lover
customer_reviews.text: Cool Shopkins set for any shopkins lover. I honestly don't get the shopkins craze, but if it keeps my daughter happy, then I'm happy. She loves the bubble gum machine. all the little bubbles contain shopkins inside.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. I figured she'd really like the gumball machine part of it and she did. She uses the "gumballs" for all kinds of little toys. I thought the cart would open, but it doesn't. And the coat rack isn't anything special. I think it's a nice addition if you have lots of shopkins and play sets but there's really not much to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: Daughter liked it but bored quickly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for her birthday gift but didn't play with it for very long before becoming bored. Wouldn't buy it again.....
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is shopkins obsessed and loves using this with her friends to trade shopkins.
customer_reviews.author: April G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fun! No quarters needed!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old LOVES this toy. She only plays with Shopkins when supervised as she is under the recommended age limit but she loves putting our shopkins in the balls and then making them come out of the machine. It's never ending fun that doesn't involve quarters!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Wildlings

customer_reviews.title: really fun and good for storage
customer_reviews.text: all the balls in the gumball machine can be used to store shopkins. so much storage including the rack and the shelves and the two suitcase things. its also just fun. we take peppa pig and her mom in her car and go shop at the sweet shop.
customer_reviews.author: G Gris

customer_reviews.title: We already have one of these playsets and love it so much that we purchased another one for ...
customer_reviews.text: We already have one of these playsets and love it so much that we purchased another one for a birthday gift. My children love the gumballs. They have so much fun putting shopkins inside of the gumballs and putting them into the machine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Gum ball Machine Crazy
customer_reviews.text: If you know a child that loves gumball machines but not so much the gum balls this is the one! It's great, the perfect present for any little shopkins fan. Robust and interactive it's a win on play dates!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my kids played with this one day and all the ...
customer_reviews.text: my kids played with this one day and all the balls are hard for them to open and the little coat rack is pointless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for shopkins lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend's daughter for her birthday party. She is crazy about shopkins and was so excited to play with it. The price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece has a Christmas present and she played with it daily. Once my daughter gets older I will buy one for her too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: My *almost* 3 year old son loves this toy. He really likes to load the balls in the gumball machine and then turn the knob to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great my 4 year old LOVES this toy!! It came with lots of balls but only 2 shopkins so I purchased a few squinkes and put them in the balls and she got so excited opening each ball and finding a new surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters play with it all the time. They love putting their shopkins (or Pokémon) in the plastic balls and turning the nob and having them roll out.... keeps them busy for a long time

customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable. I gave it to my daughter for Valentine's day and she hasn't stopped playing with it!

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: This is is a great playset. The reason I gave it 4 stars is that it is a little difficult to get all the gum balls fit in. But other than that it is a nice quality and fun playset.

customer_reviews.title: This was a great price for these little toys that every little girl ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price for these little toys that every little girl goes crazy for. It's well made and if they have other shopkins it makes for a great playset.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love this Shopkins set!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this Shopkins set!! They love to play with the balls that come with the gumball machine. They love "hanging up" they Shopkins on the rack. There are so many things to play with on this set it keeps them busy for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy and cheap. The cart that came with ours is not like the picture at all. The balls get stuck in the machine all the time. Basically my kids just play with the balls and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Another shopkins set
customer_reviews.text: Small playset, but I like this ome better than some others. 6 year old was pleased with the little gumball setup. I guess they can never have enough shopkin pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Daughter was thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves Shopkins, no matter what size or shape. Great product for her and she loves playing with it. Shopkins do contain smaller pieces though, so be careful around young children.
customer_reviews.author: TBPHX

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find red one in stores just pink, so happy I checked amazon!! Bought 2 of them, my kids love them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: cute

customer_reviews.title: and this has been the favorite of both kids
customer_reviews.text: We have several shopkins sets, and this has been the favorite of both kids. They are age three, and the surprise of what will come out seems to appeal greatly. They also seem to like the little closing bags better than the open ones. They have a lot of fun and imaginative play with all the shopkins, so though pricey, they have been worth it. They are not into collecting, so it has been easy to fill the sets with enough characters.

product_meta.title: Shopkins Sweet Spot Playset
product_meta.description:
Welcome to the sweetest store in Shopville! If you're sweet on Shopkins, then this is place to be. Send your Shopkins on a sweet ride down the gumball machine. Take a roll in the candy cart or stick around on the lollipop stand. There are so many sweet ways to display at the Sweet Spot! Includes 2 x Exclusive Candy Bags and 2 x Exclusive Shopkins.

BRAND STORY
By Shopkins
feature_bullets: Load your gumballs into the gumball machine, turn the dial and let them roll
Display your favorite Shopkinson a lollipop tree. Take your Shopkins for a ride in the candy cart
So much sweet fun and heaps of ways to display. This is one dandy candy play set!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars288 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
